projects.title: GRAPITS – Luxury Wall Texture Brand Website
projects.description: Premium brand website showcasing luxury wall textures with smooth animations and refined brand experience.
projects.problem: Luxury brand needed a premium website that could showcase their wall textures with visual storytelling, smooth animations, and a refined user experience to stand out in the competitive market.
projects.solution: Developed a React-based website with GSAP animations, responsive design, and a component-based architecture that emphasizes visual storytelling and brand identity.

features.title: Brand-Focused UI
features.description: Clean, premium design with luxury brand identity and visual storytelling

features.title: Smooth Animations
features.description: Scroll-based and interactive animations using GSAP and Framer Motion

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile with consistent experience

features.title: Component-Based Architecture
features.description: Scalable and reusable React components for easy maintenance

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Optimized assets and efficient rendering for fast load times

features.title: SEO-Friendly Pages
features.description: Structured layouts and metadata for better search engine visibility

achievements: Lead frontend development and UI/UX implementation for luxury brand
Designed responsive layouts aligned with premium brand identity
Implemented smooth animations enhancing user engagement
Converted high-fidelity designs into reusable React components
Collaborated on REST API development for scalable content handling

projects.title: Quiz24 – Anti-Cheating Quiz App
projects.description: Android quiz application with anti-cheating mechanisms, real-time scoring, and intelligent quiz management system.
projects.problem: Traditional quiz apps lacked anti-cheating mechanisms, fair question randomization, and real-time scoring systems, making them unreliable for serious knowledge testing.
projects.solution: Developed an Android-native quiz application with advanced anti-cheat features, real-time scoring, randomized questions/options, and Firebase integration for a seamless user experience.

features.title: Quiz Creation & Management
features.description: Create quizzes with topics, questions, options, and customizable timers

features.title: Anti-Cheat Mechanisms
features.description: Randomized questions and options, time constraints, and abuse prevention

features.title: Real-Time Scoring
features.description: Instant score calculation with detailed feedback and performance analytics

features.title: Timer-Based Quizzes
features.description: Enforced time limits per quiz and individual questions

features.title: Search & Discover
features.description: Find quizzes by interest, keyword, or category

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Personalized quiz recommendations based on interests

achievements: Revolutionized traditional test-taking with cutting-edge technology
Built complete UI/UX and frontend architecture
Integrated Firebase backend services end-to-end
Implemented real-time scoring and notifications
Currently capable of developing end-to-end Android applications

projects.title: Bhajan Bank – Devotional Activity Tracking App
projects.description: Web application for tracking daily devotional activities with gamification and structured logging.
projects.problem: Lack of structured platform for tracking daily devotional activities with motivation and consistency features for spiritual practitioners.
projects.solution: Built a React-based web application with gamification, activity tracking, and a clean UI that encourages consistent devotional practice through points and rewards.

features.title: Daily Bhajan Logging
features.description: Easy tracking of devotional activities with structured logging

features.title: Gamification System
features.description: Points and rewards system to encourage consistency in practice

features.title: Clean & Minimal UI
features.description: Simple, distraction-free design focused on spiritual practice

features.title: User Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive view of daily and historical activity logs

features.title: Secure Backend
features.description: API-driven data handling with proper authentication

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Visual progress indicators and achievement badges

achievements: Designed complete UI/UX for spiritual application
Developed full-stack solution from frontend to backend
Implemented gamification logic with points and rewards system
Built RESTful APIs for activity logging and user management
Managed database design and cloud deployment

projects.title: Diosa – Smart IoT-Enabled Application
projects.description: Cross-platform IoT mobile application with ESP32 integration for real-time location tracking and device monitoring.
projects.problem: Lack of integrated solutions bridging mobile applications with IoT hardware for real-time monitoring and control applications.
projects.solution: Developed a Flutter-based cross-platform application integrated with ESP32 IoT hardware and GPS module for real-time tracking and device management.

features.title: Real-Time GPS Tracking
features.description: Live location tracking using ESP32 GPS module integration

features.title: IoT Device Control
features.description: Remote control of ESP32-based hardware systems

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Works on both Android and iOS using Flutter

features.title: Real-Time Data Sync
features.description: Instant data synchronization with Firebase backend

features.title: Interactive Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive monitoring and control interface

features.title: Hardware-Software Bridge
features.description: Seamless communication between mobile app and IoT devices

achievements: Designed complete UI/UX and frontend architecture in Flutter
Built responsive and reusable widgets for dashboards and control panels
Integrated real-time GPS location data from ESP32 hardware
Coordinated hardware-software communication using ESP32 firmware
Progressed to delivering end-to-end solutions (frontend + backend + database + IoT)

projects.title: Book'n'Play – Turf Booking System
projects.description: Full-stack turf booking platform for seamless sports slot management with role-based dashboards.
projects.problem: Sports facilities lacked efficient digital systems for managing turf bookings, availability, and payments, leading to scheduling conflicts and manual management overhead.
projects.solution: Developed a comprehensive full-stack booking platform with real-time availability, role-based access, and payment tracking for turf owners and users.

features.title: Turf Slot Booking
features.description: Real-time availability checking and seamless booking system

features.title: Date & Time Validation
features.description: Prevents double booking and scheduling conflicts automatically

features.title: Role-Based Access
features.description: Separate dashboards for Admin, Turf Owners, and Users

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: JWT-based login system with proper authorization

features.title: Payment Tracking
features.description: Integrated payment status management for bookings

features.title: Booking Management
features.description: View, modify, and cancel bookings with real-time updates

achievements: Designed and developed complete frontend UI with role-based dashboards
Built backend APIs for booking management and slot validation
Implemented real-time booking validation to prevent conflicts
Integrated secure authentication and authorization system
Designed database schemas for users, bookings, and payments
